name: Hell in One
description:
An Erindale.XYZ Discord Game Jam

28 people, 14 days created a game from scratch with 7 levels, over 150 assets, an original score, and an amazing cutscene.

Knock a ball through a fictional museum in the #1 rated, nail-biting, thriller of the year.

Is it a platformer? Is it mini-golf? We couldn't decide.

"Cool but makes me angry" - Jaybah, Producer
